info.author: Patroklos Argyroudis
info.description:
KeyNote credentials describe a specific delegation of trust and subsume the 
role of public key certificates; unlike traditional certificates, which bind 
keys to names, credentials can bind keys directly to the authorization to 
perform specific tasks.
info.name: keynote
info.html_description: KeyNote credentials describe a specific delegation of trust and subsume the role of public key certificates; unlike traditional certificates, which bind keys to names, credentials can bind keys directly to the authorization to perform specific tasks.
